name: .png
description:
ping of pong - colorverse edition

first experiment with Godot in a short jam-like dev session, so it's probably buggy and lagging etc.

i haven't bought a new mouse yet [update: bought one just after the jam, yay!]

[update2] Here's the Linux version! you can now go fullscreen but not go back to original size - i'm gonna find a workaround asap.

if you're using Windows, you can find the .png files at this location:
  %appdata%\Godot\app_userdata\.png\

to get there: just press [WIN]+[R] and copy and paste the line above, then press [ENTER]

if you're using Linux, you can find the .png files at this location:
  $HOME/.godot/app_userdata/.png/

controls:

. keyboard
. . left : [A} up - [Z] or [Y] down
. . right : [K] up - [M] down
. . [ESC] to pause
. . [ENTER] or [SPACE] to accept

. gamepad (tested on Windows with Xbox 360 Wired Controller)
. . [START] to pause
. . [A] to accept

better if both players use the same controller - or someone could cheat!
